name: Bounce Zen
description:
In Bounce Zen you help guide your character through a stunning world filled with lights, just make sure to avoid the dark spots!

Simply touch the left side or right side of the screen to move the character and break white lines for points.

*Insanely simple to play yet very addictive
*Endless gameplay that never gets boring
*Great music
*Stunning levels
*Beat high scores with gamecenter support
